content.rendered:
MEDI-TECH is Hospital Management Software with advanced Windows based system and database.  The Software can be use for a single-user or multiple users in a network environment. Individual module for OPD, IPD, Pathology Lab, Billing are available.

Web base application is also available for Hospital Management which cover following modules:

  • Reception
  • OPD application
  • IPD application
  • Billing

Many hospitals are using this software. We can also customize these software according to need of doctor.
